漢羅台文: 行政院已經共《國家語言發展法》草案送到立法院、
台羅: hîng-tsìng-īnn í-king kā “kok-ka gí-giân huat-tián-huat” tshó-àn sàng kàu li̍p-huat-īnn,
台羅數字調: hing5-tsing3-inn7 i2-king1 ka7“kok4-ka1 gi2-gian5 huat4-tian2-huat4”tsho2-an3 sang3 kau3 lip8-huat4-inn7,
白話字: hêng-chèng-īⁿ í-keng kā“kok-ka gí-giân hoat-tián-hoat”chhó-àn sàng kàu li̍p-hoat-īⁿ,
